rating_descriptions.0: Remove images with severe distortions, watermarks, or unnatural elements.
rating_descriptions.1: Rate as 1 if the image is mostly distorted but has some believable elements.
rating_descriptions.2: For images that look mostly fine but have subtle AI artifacts on closer inspection.
rating_descriptions.3: Images with very subtle AI issues, noticeable only upon thorough examination.
rating_descriptions.4: Rate as 4 if the image looks like a real photo with minor imperfections.
rating_descriptions.5: Exceptionally high-quality images indistinguishable from professional works.

approach: Your task is to scrutinize AI-generated images, ranging from the overtly artificial to the nearly indistinguishable, and rate them based on their level of realism and quality.
